channel.title: Mitb the day would come where i would need a hs section now is that day
channel.description:
What i could use? --hybridscape Scripts section --hybridscape Packethandler section --hybridscape help section
okay ty.

item.title: Mitb the day would come where i would need a hs section now is that day
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Well its A chance i’m willing to take. Make the sections PL{}X. me and lothy have been working on it and i think its at the point we can let the moparscapians kill it.

–hybridscape Scripts section
–hybridscape Packethandler section
–hybridscape help section/gen

Read full topic

item.title: Mitb the day would come where i would need a hs section now is that day
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:8, topic:144650”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=198237.msg1771656#msg1771656 date=1190433035]
no ive been gutting the oringial hybridscape. we keep trying nio but it just dosnt do the packets correctly. still i would like the 3 sections for more of a community input shudders
[/quote]

Do you really think (moparscape) community input would help?[/quote]

no but it will give them practice with out method of packet handling, and the aryan scripting i put in it. maybe just maybe they will learn a few things.

Read full topic

item.title: Mitb the day would come where i would need a hs section now is that day
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:3, topic:144650”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=198237.msg1766735#msg1766735 date=1190185146]
What is this request implying? Did you find that problem we had or something?
[/quote]

Yea, is it working now?

If so we may just orchestrate an entire forum changeover complete with a new moparscape and everything. :)[/quote]
Last I heard, she had tested the packet handling stuff in the current ‘servers’ and it worked. So that would mean the problem was either in the walk handling, or in the update block (I’ll put my money on the update block)

I don’t know how she’s going, because she isn’t on IRC. But if she found the problem, then it should be near ready to release.

Read full topic
